text.tspan: Use law of sines to find A and B.
If we drop a vertical line from the inner line,
We can find C by similar triangles.
We can find D by similar triangles.
For a different rosette function, find X, H, D for a 12 gon and use those to find values for n > 12.
We need to convert so all edges are based on new radius instead of 12 radius so find X,D,H above for n=12 then multiply by sin(pi/n)/sin(pi/12) to give X', D', H'.
For bigger n, new A and B are as above. New X = X'. New D = H -(H'-D').
